alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 13 at 4:10AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Marion and southeastern Putnam Counties through 445 AM EDT... At 410 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Fort McCoy, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort McCoy, Salt Springs, Lake Delancy and Georgetown. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam
